Bash(ssh root@194.87.86.103 "cd /opt/traffic-engine && source venv/bin/activate && python -c ""
import asyncio
from traffic_engine.database import get_session
from traffic_engine.database.models import UserBotAccount

async def add_account\(\):
    async with get_session\(\) as session:
        # Check if account already exists
        from sqlalchemy import select
        result = await session.execute\(
            select\(UserBotAccount\).where\(UserBotAccount.phone == ''+18598598014''\)
        \)
        existing = result.scalar_one_or_none\(\)
        
        if existing:
            print\(''Account already exists, updating...''\)
            existing.session_name = ''test_usa''
            existing.first_name = ''James''
            existing.last_name = ''Thompson''
            existing.status = ''active''
            existing.proxy_type = ''socks5''
            existing.proxy_host = ''186.65.117.154''
            existing.proxy_port = 9055
            existing.proxy_username = ''LD8bpJ''
            existing.proxy_password = ''xWngZ4''
        else:
            print\(''Creating new account...''\)
            account = UserBotAccount\(
                phone=''+18598598014'',
                session_name=''test_usa'',
                first_name=''James'',
                last_name=''Thompson'',
                status=''active'',
                proxy_type=''socks5'',
                proxy_host=''186.65.117.154'',
                proxy_port=9055,
                proxy_username=''LD8bpJ'',
                proxy_password=''xWngZ4''
            \)
            session.add\(account\)
        
        await session.commit\(\)
        print\(''Account added/updated successfully!''\)

asyncio.run\(add_account\(\)\)
""")
